# RUN: llvm-mc --disassemble %s -triple powerpc64-unknown-unknown -mcpu=pwr8 | FileCheck %s

# CHECK: vpksdss 2, 3, 4
0x10 0x43 0x25 0xce

# CHECK: vpksdus 2, 3, 4
0x10 0x43 0x25 0x4e

# CHECK: vpkudus 2, 3, 4
0x10 0x43 0x24 0xce

# CHECK: vpkudum 2, 3, 4
0x10 0x43 0x24 0x4e

# CHECK: vupkhsw 2, 3
0x10 0x40 0x1e 0x4e

# CHECK: vupklsw 2, 3
0x10 0x40 0x1e 0xce
